snippet.title: Unravel the Secrets of Kill Fish: A Surreal 2D Side-Scroller Adventure!
snippet.description:
Experience the surreal and captivating world of Kill Fish, a 2D side-scroller platformer that takes you on a journey through a mysterious and oppressive environment. With hand-drawn graphics, a mystical storyline, and challenging gameplay, it's an unforgettable gaming experience.

🎁Wishlist today so you don't miss the next sale.
➡️https://meridian4.com/games/kill-fish

Kill Fish will transport you to a mysterious and oppressive environment full of secrets and surprises.

As you delve into the game's psychedelic and intriguing storyline, you will take on the role of a man trying to escape his past, only to find himself repeating the same mistakes repeatedly. You will play as a tired and emaciated hero, struggling to uncover the secrets of this mysterious world and find hope in the face of darkness.

One of the standout features of Kill Fish is its incredible hand-drawn graphics. Every detail is meticulously crafted, immersing you in the game's eerie and surreal atmosphere. The quirky enemy designs will scare and touch you, creating an unforgettable gaming experience.

The gameplay is a challenging blend of platformer, action, and puzzle elements, keeping you engaged and entertained as you progress through the game. You can expect a high difficulty level, but fear not - the game is always (almost) fair, providing you with a satisfying challenge that will keep you coming back for more.

But perhaps the most fascinating aspect of Kill Fish is its mystical and multi-layered storyline. The true meaning of the game's narrative will be hard to unravel, drawing you deeper into the game's world and keeping you on the edge of your seat until the very end.

Don't miss out on the opportunity to experience Kill Fish. Get your hands on this incredible game today and prepare for a journey unlike any other.

Featuring:
✅Hand-drawn graphics that immerse you in the game's surreal and mysterious world.
✅A challenging 2D side-scroller platformer gameplay that combines action, puzzle, and platforming elements.
✅A gripping and multi-layered storyline that keeps you on the edge of your seat until the very end.
✅Quirky and original enemy design that will both scare and touch you.
✅A high but fair difficulty level will keep you engaged and entertained throughout the game.

➡️ https://meridian4.com/
➡️ https://www.tiktok.com/@meridian4.games 
➡️ https://discord.com/invite/adMSaZK32K
➡️ https://twitter.com/Meridian4
➡️ https://www.instagram.com/meridian_4/
➡️ https://www.youtube.com/c/Meridian4
➡️ https://www.facebook.com/Meridian4

#sidescroller #platformer #indiegame
